description: T.1 Oak - 3m holistic crown reduction to suitable growth points where possible and removal of all deadwood Inc 1 major limb overhanging car park/site entrance.T.2 Pine - Remove and make safe, large filed limb hung up in tree. Remove deadwood & carry out ariel inspection to inform future application for removal of potential high-risk limbs.
